Description: Pointed implement of fine translucent flint, triangular with flat base. Carefully retouched at edges including base.
Bibliographic references: Brunton & Caton-Thompson 1928 / The Badarian Civilisation and Predynastic Remains near Badari (p. 7, 37; pl. xxix.6 top row, middle)
Acquisition name: Donated by: British School of Archaeology, Egypt
